text: "I'm So Fly" is the second single released by American rapper Lloyd Banks, from his debut album, The Hunger for More (2004). ==Background== "I'm So Fly" was released on July 13, 2004. It was produced by Timbaland and Danja. ==Music video== The music video to the song was directed by Jessy Terrero. It features cameos from G-Unit affiliates 50 Cent, Young Buck, DJ Whoo Kid and Olivia. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |- !scope="col"| Chart (2004) !scope="col"| Peak position |- !scope="row"|US Bubbling Under Hot 100 Singles (Billboard) |align="center"|2 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 singles Category:2004 songs Category:Lloyd Banks songs Category:Song recordings produced by Danja (record producer) Category:Song recordings produced by Timbaland Category:Songs written by Lloyd Banks Category:G-Unit Records singles Category:Interscope Records singles Category:Songs written by Timbaland Category:Songs written by Danja (record producer)
title: I'm So Fly
